---------------------------------------------
R4 TEST 

2000 - 1000 = 1000 = 0x3e8


00101 - RS2
R5 gets 2^ in its slices.

LI R5 with 0000011111010000 at index 0 - 000
LI R5 with 0000011111010000 at index 2 - 010
LI R5 with 0000011111010000 at index 4 - 100
LI R5 with 0000011111010000 at index 6 - 110



00001 - RS1
R1 gets 2^ in its slices.

LI R1 with 0000001111101000 at index  X - XXX
LI R1 with 0000001111101000 at index  X - XXX
LI R1 with 0000001111101000 at index  X - XXX
LI R1 with 0000001111101000 at index  X - XXX


 
00000
R0 gets result.

Opcode
1100001110001010000100000  


program

0000000001111101000000101  
0010000001111101000000101  
0100000001111101000000101  
0110000001111101000000101  
0000000000111110100000001  
0010000000111110100000001  
0100000000111110100000001  
0110000000111110100000001  
1100001110001010000100000  

passes.

---------------------------------------------------
